remarks: The binary relationship form of the ` Apply ` function.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
brapply.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
brapply.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
brapply.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
brapply $p |- ( <. A , B >. Apply C <-> C = ( A ` B ) ) $.
